data.title: About ILIO
data.text:
Our Story

ILIO was founded in 1994 as a producer and distributor of innovative and inspiring tools for musicians. Weâ€™re based in Southern California.

Our goal is to differentiate ourselves by carrying only the most well conceived and brilliantly executed products for our growing customer list of professional musicians and producers.

ILIO is the proud, exclusive North American distributor of Spectrasonics, The Vienna Symphonic Library, Synthogy, Overloud, Applied Acoustics Systems, Audio Modeling, PlugIn Guru, Yum Audio, Nextmidi, Sessionwire, Hornberg Research, and Delta Sound Labs.

Need Help?
